snippet: President Obama spoke on Friday with homeowners in Nevada who have benefited from mortgage refinancing policies his administration introduced last year.
abstract: Pres Obama returns to the topic of the economy as he campaigns in Nevada, a day after unexpectedly endorsing same-sex marriage and injecting a volatile social issue into the 2012 race; promotes his proposals to allow more Americans to get low-interest mortgage refinancing.
lead_paragraph: President Obama spoke on Friday with homeowners in Nevada who have benefited from mortgage refinancing policies his administration introduced last year.

headline.seo: Obama Returns Focus to Economy and Mortgage Policies
headline.main: Obama Returns to Topic of Economic Recovery
headline.print_headline: Obama Returns to Topic Of Economic Recovery

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
